CustomField.formula:
/* HdG - 10/10/2024: Plantyn has one item that should be allowed to have License duration of 24 months. This formula is blocking them from manually ordering this item. Therefore this validation is disabled. IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c,"Plantyn"),ProductLicenseDuration__c > 12),1,0) */
0
CustomField.label: Validate CannotSellLicenseMoreThan12Mont
